reviews.productTitle: Leviton 5621-2W 20 Amp, 120/277 Volt Decora Plus Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, White
reviews.text: It says it's "leviton" but either it's fake or there are serious quality control issues at leviton suddenly. The switch is junk. It has a gross sort of soft clump sound and feel when you activate the switch. It's totally unlike all the other decora rocker switches I've ever seen. They all have the same consistent click sound and feel and you don't realize how consistent all the rocker switches are in the world until you activate this one and hear the little wet cardboard thud it makes. It does technically work as a switch though, I checked.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
reviews.title: For some reason it doesn't click. More of a soft bump feeling

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 5621-2W 20 Amp, 120/277 Volt Decora Plus Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, White
reviews.text: I tried the Leviton 5601 which is promoted as a quiet switch, and yet the click on that model is MUCH too loud for my liking! Take a listen to the video posted for that item by Stuart Schwartz on 6/30/20 to have a listen. But, THIS 5621 is the true quiet switch if that's important to you. It has a very nice solid feel. This model handles 20 amps, vs 15 amps on the 5601, but that is not a problem if your true needs are a 15 amp switch. This just means this switch can handle more amperage than the other model. It will work fine for 15 amp circuits. You are paying more for this extra amperage handling ability (beefier insides). It's up to you whether having a true quiet switch is worth the extra money.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.title: This is the true quiet switch.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 5621-2W 20 Amp, 120/277 Volt Decora Plus Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, White
reviews.text: The switches are okay... they work, they look good... but they just don't FEEL good. Given the cost I would hope for a smoother easier switching mechanism. It's not going to stop me putting them everywhere in my house... I need to get it done! No time for shopping for the perfect switch.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
reviews.title: The mechanism leaves a lot to be desired but they work

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 5621-2W 20 Amp, 120/277 Volt Decora Plus Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, White
reviews.text: In general, this is a nice commercial-grade switch with back and side wiring. As others have noted, don't back out the side screws too far, or they can become disconnected from the internal nut and there is no way to fix this. They should arrive backed out as far as they should go, don't loosen. I did receive one unit where the screw was disengaged from the nut out of the box; had to send it back to Amazon as defective. Otherwise, 5 stars.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2018
reviews.title: Careful with side screws

reviews.productTitle: Leviton 5621-2W 20 Amp, 120/277 Volt Decora Plus Rocker Single-Pole AC Quiet Switch, White
reviews.text: I had a switch that was getting warm because too many amps were flowing through it. This switch handled the current without getting warm. I then decided to get the source of the high amperage checked and found out it needed to be replaced. Turns out I needed new equipment and not this switch, but I will use it elsewhere in the house because I have some switches that need replacing. This switch operates smoothly and functions perfectly. Some of the switches in my house require an extra little pressure for the click after initially pressing them. Not this one. Just press it on or off and it moves smoothly and works perfectly. I will see how it works over time.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018
reviews.title: Handled the amperage the previous switch couldn't
